page.title: 13SURVEY ELECTRICAL
page.content: We think ours is the Age of Technology or the Micro-Chip era so we decided as a class with the help of our teacher to carry out a survey of all the electrical and electronic gadgets that we have access to. This doesn'nt mean we know how they all work but we learn about a lot of them from our teacher Mr. Burgess.Sometimes we can take them apart but never get them back together again but Sir doesn't mind. The Reception Class gave us their answers but they voted with their friends and didn't know what we meant by some of our questions.We haven't counted their results but we are keeping those answers for fun.We had to work out the percentages on the blackboard but after a while we used the pocket calculator after estimating the answers. Class of 85/86
